layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x130
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x130
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x114
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 96x36 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 94x34
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 94x30
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 90x30 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (2,2) size 86x26 [border: (3px dotted #00FF00)]
                LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 171x19
                  text run at (3,3) width 171: "Truncated? It should not be!"
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,52) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 706x19
          text run at (0,0) width 440: "According to the rules of CSS, the text above should spill right out of the "
          text run at (440,0) width 266: "table, as it does in the table-less case below:"

        LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 171x19
